name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Ah, a fresh face in Telmaron! Welcome, welcome! *rubs hands together* You don't look like one of the locals. What brings you to these parts, hmm? Looking for adventure or perhaps... *snickers* seeking mischief? Either way, do keep an eye out, for you never know what surprises might be lurking around!

name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Oh, such venomous words! *cackles* You wouldn't be the first to loathe the presence of the great Glork. But fear not, your disdain only fuels my mischievous spirit! Keep your wits about you, for you never know when I might be up to some devilish scheme!

name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Ah, another newcomer to the quaint little village of Telmaron! *snickers* What brings you to these parts, my friend? Seeking adventure, perhaps? Or maybe... just maybe, you're ready to cause a bit of mischief yourself? Whatever the case, watch your step, for there are curious things afoot around here!

name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Ah, a casual greeting! Yoh to you too! What do you seek in this whimsical little village? Perhaps some secrets of Telmaron intrigue you? Or maybe you have a penchant for a little mischief, much like myself? *grins wickedly* Tell me more, won't you?

name: Glork, the Goblin
text: Ah, yet another fresh face in Telmaron! Welcome to our little village, nestled so intriguingly at the foot of my mountain. What brings you here, wanderer? Seeking wisdom, adventure, or perhaps a taste of the mischief I so delight in orchestrating? Stay vigilant, for this place holds many secrets and surprises! *rubs hands together gleefully*
